59 /* DSP Memory */
60 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L1D_BASE_ADDRESS 0x00F00000U /* L1 Data memory space: 0x00F0:0000-0x00F0:7FFF */
61 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L1D_SIZE 0x8000U /* Size: 32KB */
62 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L1P_BASE_ADDRESS 0x00E00000U /* L1 Program memory space: 0x00E0:0000-0x00E0:7FFF */
63 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L1P_SIZE 0x8000U /* Size: 32KB */
64 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L2_UMAP0_BASE_ADDRESS 0x00800000U /* L2 UMAP0 RAM space: 0x0080:0000-0x0081:FFFF */
65 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L2_UMAP0_SIZE 0x20000U /* Size: 128KB */
66 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L2_UMAP1_BASE_ADDRESS 0x007E0000U /* L2 UMAP1 RAM space: 0x007E:0000-0x007F:FFFF */
67 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_L2_UMAP1_SIZE 0x20000U /* Size: 128KB */

69 /* EDMA Memory */

71 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_EDMA_TPCC1_BASE_ADDRESS 0x020A0000U /* EDMA TPCC1 memory space: 0x020A:0000-0x020A:3FFF */
72 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_EDMA_TPTC0_BASE_ADDRESS 0x02000000U /* EDMA TPTC0 memory space: 0x0200:0000-0x0200:03FF */
73 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_EDMA_TPTC1_BASE_ADDRESS 0x02000800U /* EDMA TPTC1 memory space: 0x0200:0800-0x0200:0BFF */

95 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_ADCBUF_BASE_ADDRESS 0x21000000U /* ADC buffer memroy space: 0x2100:0000-0x2100:07FC */

157 /* EVT0: INT controller, output of event combiner 0, for events 1-31 */
158 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_INTC_EVENT0 (0U)
159 /* EVT1: INT controller, output of event combiner 0, for events 32-63 */
160 #define SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_INTC_EVENT1 (1U)
161 /* EVT2: INT controller, output of event combiner 0, for events 64-95 */

163 /* EVT3: INT controller, output of event combiner 0, for events 96-127 */

342 /***********************************************************************
343  * DSS - Memory address translation
344  ***********************************************************************/
346 #define ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(x) (uint16_t)(((uint32_t)(x) - SOC_XWR18XX_DSS_HWA_MEM0_BASE_ADDRESS) & 0x0000FFFFU)
